channel.title: Softwares on Timm Lichte
channel.description: Recent content in Softwares on Timm Lichte

item.title: Software & Resources
item.description:
I’ve been involved in the creation of the following software and resources.

Language resources

  • COLF-VID & German SemEval-2013 task 5b: Data set of the Shared Task on the Disambiguation of German Verbal Idioms at KONVENS 2021
  • COLF-VID: Corpus of Literal and Figurative Readings
  • PARSEME Shared Task: Corpus of German idioms

Grammar engineering

  • XMG-WebGUI: A web GUI for compiling and displaying metagrammars written with XMG.
  • TuLiPA: A parsing environment for variants of Tree-Adjoining Grammar.

LaTeX

  • biblatex-muss: Minimal Unified Style Sheet for Computational Linguistics
  • LaTeX templates
  • Langscibook class: The book template of Language Science Press.

Emacs

  • helm-khard: A Helm interface for khard
  • org-fm: Fast minutes with org-fm
